name: DarkMatter: The Strange Messenger
description:
Explore the Earth that has been transformed by dark matter.

Go around the globe where everything is gone and find out what dark matter is.
Listen to the stories of life told by those who survived the harsh environment.

The harsh play environment may be waiting for you.

If you miss your step, you fall into a cliff and fail your mission. At every turn, enemies will attack you and push you down.
You may experience emotions beyond hardships and adversity that those living in the game have experienced.
Please control your anger and keep your composure. Protect your keyboard and mouse. They're precious.
If you give up this game in the middle, it will make us sad and hard. More stories still want to come out into the world.
I support your challenge. Don't give up!

You can't use all of them at once just because you've learned various skills.

Fit 3 skills to suit the situation and play.
Don't worry too much. You can replace it right away.
You can learn 9 active and 9 passive skills.
Study your own various skill trees.
The context-sensitive skill tree makes it easier to navigate through a congested section.
Skill initialization items sold by merchants can be initialized at any time.

Use Black Cube's knowledge.

It's not that there's no way out of the harsh environment.
Gather resources during the expedition, gather materials in battle with monsters, and acquire knowledge of the Black Cube.
You can also acquire better Black Cube knowledge by purchasing unique items from merchants.
Black Cube's knowledge will strengthen your equipment. This will help you on a rough expedition.

A feast of unfounded art

I thought about drawing-style art, cell animation techniques, and other various methods and used them generously.
We introduce you to Studio 215's unique artwork, which realizes that mixing all the delicious ingredients does not produce delicious food.

Features


- Jumping and falling
- Skill selection and strategic cost management
- Battle of Boss
- Storytelling and Ending through Lines
- Farming goods and purchasing items
